results.content: A good course but it could be better, i hope you just explained the source code a little bit further instead of wasting a whole chapter going through basics while it's supposed to be an advanced course on web services and APIs . i hated when you just copied the code and we're supposed to pause the video and type in to catch up

response.content: I will keep that in mind.. tnx.
response.content_html: I will keep that in mind.. tnx.

results.content: Instructor was quick to respond to questions, replying and following up within hours of posting question. The instructor  continued to be responsive throughout  the course.   Some sections seemed a little fast, but all in all a good experience.
results.content_html: Instructor was quick to respond to questions, replying and following up within hours of posting question. The instructor continued to be responsive throughout the course. Some sections seemed a little fast, but all in all a good experience.
